title: Bakewell tart traybake
ingredients: ['1 (500g) packet shortcrust pastry', '7 tablespoons strawberry jam', '200g golden caster sugar', '200g softened butter', '4 eggs', '100g self raising flour', '100g ground almonds', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '300g icing sugar', '3 tablespoons water', '18 glace cherries, to decorate', '25g toasted flaked almonds']
